p: The synthesis of the mesoporous material was performed according to the protocol described by Bernardos et al. [ 59]. The synthesis process was carried out following the “atrane route” [ 60] in which the structure-directing agent is composed of an intermediate species between CTAB and TEAH 3. The molar ratio between the reagents was as follows: 7 TEAH 3: 2 TEOS: 0.52 CTAB: 0.5 NaOH: 180 H 2O.
